title: Fragment, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidery in stem and back stitches on plain weave
description: Curving stem bearing exotic flowers and two long tailed birds. The embroidery is done over an drawn outline which is visible.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 17th century.
late 17th century. Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidery in stem and back stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-336.
